channel.title: ...:::Charriot Scape Development Team Recruiting:::
channel.description:
Charriot Scape will be a new Server with awsome & unique features. I cannot do all this work by myself, so I am asking some of the best in this community to come forward and help out. We will be developing: new items, new interfaces, a webclient, new sprites, and much more. If we work hard, this could very well be the best sever yet!
[img]http://i217.photobucket.com/albums/cc94/Charriot13/ClientLogin.jpg[/img]
[b]Jobs[/b] Webclient Developers: - - -
Sprite Creators: - - -
"Coders": -bugra52 - -
Application: [b]E-mail Adress: Applying For The Position of: Knowledge in This Field: Former Projects I Have Worked On:[/b]
My MSN messenger is thekeepa@hotmail.com - contact me fo questions.
